message_1: If you implement the Caesar cipher with a shift of 5, what is the encrypted message for the plaintext "MATHISFUN"?
message_2:
To encrypt the message "MATHISFUN" using the Caesar cipher with a shift of 5, we will shift each letter in the message 5 positions forward in the alphabet. If we reach the end of the alphabet, we will wrap around to the beginning.

M -> R
A -> F
T -> Y
H -> M
I -> N
S -> X
F -> K
U -> Z
N -> S

So, the encrypted message is "RFYMNXKSZ".
